sentences.en: And how does he expect to provide for my grandchild?
sentences.cn: 那他打算用什么来抚养我们的孙子?

sentences.en: Ask the clerk in payroll to show you pictures of her new grandchild.
sentences.cn: 让工资处的人把她刚出生的小孙孙的照片拿给你看看.

sentences.en: FRANK: you are his favorite grandchild.
Have you no consideration for my grandchild's future?
sentences.cn: 你就不为我孙女的终身大事想想 吗 ?

sentences.en: He lavished kisses upon his grandchild.
He loves his grandchild very much.
His grandchild is a naughty boy.
sentences.cn: 他的孙子是个淘气的男孩.
玛丽很疼爱她的孙子孙女们。

sentences.en: Pablito , his only Grandchild, ran to greet him.
sentences.cn: 他唯一的孙子, 跑过来迎接他.

sentences.en: She asked her grandchild to take care of the cat while she was away on holiday.
sentences.cn: 她要她的孙儿在她出外度假时,代为照顾那只猫.

sentences.en: She was my last living grandparent and I was her only grandchild.
sentences.cn: 她是我祖辈中最后一位离世的,我是她惟一的外孙.

sentences.en: The day before the flood, her littlest grandchild had come down with malaria.
sentences.cn: 洪水前的一天, 她最小的孙子得了疟疾病倒了.

sentences.en: We could steal a grandchild or two and go on a real cruise with you.
sentences.cn: 我们可以偷偷带走一两个孙子,跟你作一次真正的航行.

sentences.en: We're taking our little grandchild away with us. We'll make sure he has the time of his life.
sentences.cn: 我们会把小孙子带走。我们一定会让他过得开心。

sentences.en: You don't know where your grandchild lives?
sentences.cn: 你是说你不知道你的孙女住哪儿?

trans.tran_en: the child of your son or daughter
